RelativeMeanError - Class in evs.metric.metrics
Computes the mean difference between the forecasts and observations, which is indicative of first-order bias in the forecasts, divided by the mean of the observations.

ROCScore - Class in evs.metric.metrics
The ROC score comprises the rescaled area under the ROC curve (AUC), which provides a measure of a probability forecasts ability to discriminate between events and non-events according to the observed outcome at different forecast probability levels.
ROCScore(DoubleProcedureParameter, ROCScorePointsParameter, ForecastTypeParameter, UnconditionalParameter, FittedAUCParameter, ReferenceForecastParameter, ROCScoreMethodParameter, MinimumSampleSizeParameter, BootstrapParameter) - Constructor for class evs.metric.metrics.ROCScore
Attempts to construct a ROC Score object with associated parameters.
ROCScoreMethodParameter - Class in evs.metric.parameters
Records the method used to compute the empirical ROC score.
ROCScoreMethodParameter() - Constructor for class evs.metric.parameters.ROCScoreMethodParameter
Default constructor uses the trapezoid rule to integrate the empirical ROC curve.

Constructs an object with an integer parameter value
